import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' function Format (props) { const {submitForm, initialName, initialPetType, initialDescription, initialSkills} = props const [name, setName] = useState(initialName); const [petType, setPetType] = useState(initialPetType); const [description, setDescription] = useState(initialDescription); const [skills, setSkills] = useState(initialSkills); return(
submitForm(e, {name, petType, description, skills})}>
{setName(e.target.value)}}/>
{setPetType(e.target.value)}}/>
{setDescription(e.target.value)}}/>
{/* {setSkills(e.target.value.split(','))}}/> */}
Cancel
); } export default Format;
